categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation

nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation 4

Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation 4 is the fourth issue of the canon comic book miniseries Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation, which adapts the film of the same name. The issue was written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Will Sliney, and published on January 30, 2019 by Marvel Comics.

THE KESSEL RUN! HAN, CHEWBACCA and QI'RA have one chance to keep DRYDEN VOS from killing them…teaming up with LANDO and L3 to pull off the impossible KESSEL RUN heist! But if they succeed, will ENFYS NEST once again take their stolen goods?
